thread.title: Cleveland woman who 'almost got away with murder' gets life for killing husband with car
thread.title_full: Cleveland woman who 'almost got away with murder' gets life for killing husband with car

author: Cory Shaffer, cleveland.com
title: Cleveland woman who 'almost got away with murder' gets life for killing husband with car
text: Ashley Shutes, 33, was sentenced to life in prison with parole eligibility after 15 years Thursday on a murder charge. Shutes repeatedly hit her husband, Ronrico Shutes, with her SUV after an argument, then lied to police and told them it was an accident, a jury found.
